channel.title: 영어 글쓰기 on My English
channel.description: Recent content in 영어 글쓰기 on My English

item.title: Fun Things about Guinness World Records
item.description: Introduction I can assume that you guys already know about the Guinness Book and what it does. As everyone in the world already knows, it is a special book to list up world best records. Personally speaking, if I have a my own record on the book, it would be not only great honor to me but also an honor to my family too. With this essay, I would like to share the fun history of the book which perhaps you never won’t to search or might not to know forever since that is just trivial thing.

item.title: TV and Movies
item.description: I don’t think watching TV is not that educational. It requires no effort, and people don’t have to exercise their imagination, because TV swiftly shows what comes next. People become stereotyped and uniform. However, some programs, documentaries for example, give opportunities to explore new worlds, broadening our experience and giving us the chance to think. A lot of people in modern society are hooked on TV. The idiot box has become a “third parent” to our children and a “second spouse” to our wives and husbands.

item.title: 028 - Disasters
item.description: check list grammar example try 1형식 The dog sleeps on the sofa. Disasters take place everywhere every time. 2형식 - 상태 He is a firefighter. I’m sometimes scared of the clap of thunder. 2형식 - 변화 Paul became the president. Now the virus became a huge and massive disaster we never been experienced before. 2형식 - 감각 This cookie tastes good.

item.title: 027 - Birth Rate In South Korea
item.description: 템플릿 grammar example try 1형식 The dog sleeps on the sofa . 2형식 - 상태 He is a firefighter. 2형식 - 변화 Paul became the president. 2형식 - 감각 This cookie tastes good. 3형식 I watched a movie with Anna. 4형식 My mother bought me a shirt. 5형식 - (명사/형용사) Her friends call her “Little Susie.

item.title: 글쓰기 템플릿
item.description: grammar example try 1형식 The dog sleeps on the sofa . 2형식 - 상태 He is a firefighter. 2형식 - 변화 Paul became the president. 2형식 - 감각 This cookie tastes good. 3형식 I watched a movie with Anna. 4형식 My mother bought me a shirt. 5형식 - (명사/형용사) Her friends call her “Little Susie.
